resources.string: Rotten Movies has crashed, but a report has been sent to the developer to help fix the issue!
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK.
You might add your comments about the problem below:

Known bugs and missing features:
 -On details screen pressing Home button (physical) crashres application
 -Refresh Button not working
 -Favourites not working
 -On Click image from Details not expanding
 -All tabs load a maximum of 50 movies
 -All view except BoxOffice need UI/UX changes
 -Details View needs scrolling up to show filled actionbar
 -Details View needs scrolling down to show full image
 -In Theaters no infinite scroll
 -Upcoming Movies no infinite scroll
